features.description: CRITICAL: Only work on services/matching/src/routes.ts. Do NOT fix lint errors in other files. TASK: In the POST /find endpoint (line 17), replace the TODO comment and empty matches array with actual matching logic. Steps: 1) Import TherapistMatcher from './therapist-matcher', 2) Instantiate the matcher with client preferences from req.body, 3) Call matcher.findMatches() to get scored results, 4) Return {matches: results, count: results.length}. The endpoint currently returns {matches: [], count: 0} - change this to return real data. IGNORE all lint/typecheck errors in remix-frontend - focus ONLY on services/matching/src/routes.ts.
